SRP.Q: On Rural Communities, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1989 relative to that in 1982 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Rural Communities, the data point in 1989 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1982.

SRP.Q: In 1981, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Urban Dwellers relative to Rural Communities?
SRP.A: In 1981, Urban Dwellers is {below} Rural Communities in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Rural Communities's Technology Adoption Rate levels?
VPR.A: Rural Communities's technology adoption rate levels show a {stable rising} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Urban Dwellers's Technology Adoption Rate levels?
VPR.A: Urban Dwellers's technology adoption rate levels show a {single valley} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Working Professionals's Technology Adoption Rate levels?
VPR.A: Working Professionals's technology adoption rate levels show a {bimodal valley} trend.

VPR.Q: Which line shows a stable rising trend in Technology Adoption Rate levels?

VE.Q: What is Rural Communities's Technology Adoption Rate in 1987?
VE.A: Rural Communities's technology adoption rate in 1987 is {37.76} %.

VE.Q: What is Rural Communities's Technology Adoption Rate in 1980?
VE.A: Rural Communities's technology adoption rate in 1980 is {28.60} %.

VE.Q: What is Urban Dwellers's Technology Adoption Rate in 1986?
VE.A: Urban Dwellers's technology adoption rate in 1986 is {8.89} %.

VE.Q: What are the technology adoption rate of Urban Dwellers, Rural Communities, and Working Professionals in 1986?
VE.A: Urban Dwellers's technology adoption rate is {8.89} %, Rural Communities's technology adoption rate is {35.94} %, Working Professionals's technology adoption rate is {0.18} %.

SC.A: The rate of growth in Rural Communities's technology adoption rate is {58.00}%.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Working Professionals's Technology Adoption Rate?
SC.A: The average value of Working Professionals's technology adoption rate is {0.77} %.

NC.Q: Was Urban Dwellers's Technology Adoption Rate in 1978 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The technology adoption rate in 1978 was {higher} than in 1984.

NC.Q: In 1978, which line had the highest Technology Adoption Rate, Urban Dwellers, Working Professionals, or Rural Communities?
NC.A: In 1978, {Rural Communities} had the highest technology adoption rate.

NC.Q: Was Rural Communities's Technology Adoption Rate in 1980 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The technology adoption rate in 1980 was {lower} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Was Urban Dwellers's Technology Adoption Rate in 1980 higher or lower than in 1988?
NC.A: The technology adoption rate in 1980 was {lower} than in 1988.

MSR.Q: Which label shows the largest fluctuation in the line chart?
MSR.A: The label with the largest fluctuation is {Rural Communities}.

MSR.Q: Which line shows the fastest average growth rate between 1986 and 1989?
MSR.A: {Urban Dwellers} has the fastest average growth rate between 1986 and 1989.

MSR.Q: Which label had the leading technology adoption rate since 1986?
MSR.A: Since 1986, {Rural Communities} had the leading technology adoption rate.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Working Professionals. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(4 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1978, 1980, 1988, 1989}.
